mapper.update: update message set isRead = true where receiveId=#{accountName}
update message set isRead = true where id = #{messageId}
mapper.select: select message.*,u.name as 'sendName',c.name as 'comeName' from message left join user u on u.accountName=sendId join homework h on h.id=jumpId join course c on c.code=h.code where receiveId=#{accountName} order by isRead,time;
select message.*,u.name as 'sendName' from message left join user u on u.accountName=sendId where receiveId=#{accountName} and !isRead;
